Father pleads guilty, avoids prison in twins' hot car deaths

Juan Rodriguez appeared at a virtual hearing and pleaded guilty to two counts of second-degree reckless endangerment, a misdemeanor. He avoided jail time with a conditional discharge, which would be voided if he is arrested within the next year.
